subject.normal: [clearview-discuss] re: [networking-discuss] code review request for public DLPI library

headers.subject: [clearview-discuss] re: [networking-discuss] code review request for public DLPI library
headers.x-spam-status: No, score=-2.0 required=5.0 tests=BAYES_00,MISSING_HEADERS, NO_RECEIVED,NO_RELAYS autolearn=disabled version=3.2.4

body.para: On Tue, 2006-10-03 at 18:39 -0400, Sagun Shakya wrote:

quote.quotepara: * 39: I don't think this comment is necessary: nightly will automatically flag needless dependencies.
I had added this as a code review comment I got from Seb. So if Seb's suggestion was intended for a different reason I'll keep the comment else remove it.

body.para: Feel free to remove it if you don't find it useful. I was just curious while looking at the Makefile why it would need libinetutil, which prompted my original comment.
